modName: (No more Childish Throw-voices) Natures Lure Subtle Edition
summary:
Make your throw voice make subtle animal noises to distract your enemies.
<br />
<br />Stop acting like a 5 years old... No more "Hey, melon nose" and "Hey, slug breath"!!
descriptionHtml:
Tired of the stupid "Hey Melon nose", "hey skeever butt" and other childish remarks from the throw voice?  

They don't fit with your Dovahkiin personality? 
[url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/1056557-krail3r/]
Krail3r[/url] has solved this problem years ago with his [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19977/?]Natures Lure [/url]mod.  I loved it, but I thought it was too loud, specially when using in-doors. 

So I edited the audio files to make them more subtle. 

I wanted throw-voice to act as something that creates noises but in which the victims aren't really sure what they heard... and thus they try to check for themselves. 

Installation:
-------------------------------

This mod simply overwrites the audio files of the Throw voice power, there's no .esp. Simply throw them into your data folder (preferably via a mod manager software) and you're good to go. 

[b]If you play Skyrim with subtitles on, you should install the original Natures Lure first[/b] (the .esp contained in that mod will disable the subtitle for the throw voice). 

-------------------------------


Here's a video of Subtle Natures Lure at use:
[youtube]D5EF-r5IBWM[/youtube]

Here's a video comparison between Vanilla, Original Natures Lure and My version of Natures Lure.
[youtube]XjsjYkdN8Zc[/youtube]
author: Cookie Dynamics
